MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. This is causing flickering power and loss of power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.16pm. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.27pm on Sunday, 13th December 2020.
